trans-unit.target:
Dresses

POMPdeLUX has dresses in many different colours and cuts. You can find dresses for parties and special occasions and dresses that are perfect for everyday wear and play. At POMPdeLUX we have dresses for all girls – both big and small. All you have to do is pick your favourite. Our dresses start from size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

T-shirts-Tops

T-shirts and tops can be worn all year round and they are lovely both in summer and winter. POMPdeLUX has t-shirths and tops in many different colours and models as well as something for both big and small girls. Our t-shirts and tops are lovely soft quality and have many great details. Find your favourite t-shirt for everyday wear or a pretty top for more festive occasions. Our t-shirts and tops sizes start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Tunics-Blouses

POMPdeLUX has a wide range of tunics and blouses for big and small girls. Here you can find many different models and colours and there is something for all tastes. Find both basic blouses for everyday wear and festive tunics for special occasions. Our tunics and blouses start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Knitwear-Cardigans

For cold winter days and chilly summer evenings it is nice to have a warm jumper. POMPdeLUX has both sweaters and cardigans in lovely soft quality and you can find a wide selection of colours and models. Find your favourite amongst fleece jackets, cardigans, blouses, sweats and jumpers. Our sweaters and cardigans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Waistcoats

Every outfit is gorgeous with a waistcoat. POMPdeLUX has both chic knitted waistcoats and beautiful warm waistcoats for the cold winter days. Combine your waistcoat with a pair of jeans and a t-shirt for everyday wear and wear it over a dress for more festive occasions. Our vests start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Jumpsuits

A jumpsuit is a smart choice for both everyday play and for more festive occasions. POMPdeLUX has chosen the loveliest jumpsuits for both big and small girls. Here you will find exactly your favourite model and colour. Use your jumpsuit over a basic t-shirt or combine it with lovely sweaters and accessories. Our jumpsuits start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Pants

At POMPdeLUX you will find trousers with the best fit to your child. We have a wide range of colours and models – regardless whether you prefer jeggings, jeans, baggy or slimfit trousers. Our trousers are made from lovely materials including sweat and knit fabric and you will find trousers for all occasions. Our trousers start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Jeans

Jeans come in many different models and colours. POMPdeLUX has just the fit that suits your child best. There are baggy, slimift and jeggings for both big and small girls. Our jeans have lots of great details and are strong for everyday play. Combine your favourite jeans or jeggings with a gorgeous tunic and boost up your outfit. Our trousers, jeggings and jeans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Shorts-Skirts

POMPdeLUX has shorts and skirts for all girls. Choose amongst many different models and gorgeous colours and notice all the great details with print and tulle. Combine both shorts and skirts with bottoms such as leggings or tights and tops such as t-shirts, sweaters and cardigans. Our shorts and skirts start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Outerwear-Fleece

An important part of your child’s wardrobe is outerwear. Find you favourite down jacket, fleece jacket, gilet or snowsuit among the many colours and models. All of our outerwear is designed to keep your child warm and dry in all types of weather. Especially our technical outerwear is of high quality and secure and therefore both water tight, wind tight and breathable. Notice also the many details such as reflectors, removable hood, wind skirt, shoe straps and pockets. Our jackets, snow pants, fleece jackets and snow suits start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Leggings

Leggings are a stable part of your child’s basic wardrobe. POMPdeLUX has leggings in lovely soft materials which all girls enjoy wearing. Use leggings under a dress, skirt or shorts and do not forget our basic tops which go perfectly with our leggings. Our leggings start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Socks-Tights

Socks and tights are a stable part of your child’s basic wardrobe. POMPdeLUX has lots of socks and tights in lovely soft materials which all girls enjoy wearing. Use tights under a dress, skirt or shorts and do not forget our socks which match perfectly with the colours of our entire collection. Our tights start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Underwear-Nightwear

At POMPdeLUX we make underwear and nightwear that is nice to wear. This is why we use soft materials that are of high quality and which your child will love wearing. Underwear and nightwear must not only be practical but also have a great design. In the collection you can find underpants, hipsters, panties, undershirts, night dresses and pyjamas. Our underwear and nightwear start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Accessories

To complete your child’s wardrobe the collection can be combined with our many cute accessories. POMPdeLUX has everything from hair accessories, suspenders and belts to mittens, hats and scarves. Our popular accessories match the rest of the collection and can therefore be combined with smart dresses, lovely cardigans and cool trousers. Our belts, suspenders, mittens, hats, scarves and hair accessories can be used by girls of all ages and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Oeko-Tex

At POMPdeLUX we love high quality clothing and your child must naturally have the best. This is why our socks, underwear, nightwear and a number of our t-shirts, sweats, cardigans, polos and trousers are Oekotex certified. Oekotex label is your guarantee that our products are approved by the international Oeko-tex standard. We therefore guarantee lovely high quality materials to children of all ages.

Organic

At POMPdeLUX we love high quality clothing and your child must naturally have the best. This is why our underpants, boxers, undershirts, bodies, sleepers and pyjamas are GOTS certified. This means that we work with organic textiles, where at least 95% of the materials are organic, and also that the production is run in environmentally and socially responsible manner. We therefore guarantee lovely high quality materials to children of all ages.

T-Shirts

T-shirts can be worn all year round and they are lovely both in summer and winter. POMPdeLUX has t-shirts in many different colours and models as well as something for both big and small boys. Our t-shirts are lovely soft quality and have many great details and prints. Find your favourite t-shirt for everyday wear or a cool polo for festive occasions. Our t-shirts start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Shirts-Polo shirts

Shirts and polos are smart on any boy. POMPdeLUX makes many different models, patterns and colours which complete both the small and the big boy’s wardrobe. We focus especially on the many fine details such as breast pocket, collars, buttons and print. Find the shirt or polo your boy will love and combine it with a pullover, slipover, cardigan or sweatshirt. Our shirts and polos start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Cardigans-Pullovers

For cold winter days and chilly summer evenings it is nice to have a warm jumper or cardigan. POMPdeLUX has pullovers, cardigans and slipovers in lovely soft quality and you can find a wide selection of colours and models. Find your favourite amongst fleece jackets, cardigans, blouses, sweats, slipovers and pullovers. Our pullovers and cardigans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Sweatshirts

A sweatshirt is cool for both big and small boys. At POMPdeLUX you will find sweats with print, lovely soft fleece jackets and cool sport jackets with zipper in the the most gorgeous high quality materials. Find your favourite amongst the many colours and materials. Our sweatshirts, sports jackets and fleece jackets start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Pants

At POMPdeLUX you will find trousers with the best fit to your child. We have a wide selection of colours and models – regardless whether you prefer baggy, regular, slimfit, sweatpants, chinos or jeans. Our trousers are made from lovely materials including sweat and cotton and there are trousers for all occasions. Our trousers, chinos and jeans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Jeans

Jeans must be comfortable to wear and therefore it is important to find exactly the right jeans for your child. At POMPdeLUX you will find jeans in different colours and models. Choose between baggy, regular, slimfit, sweatpants, chinos or jeans. Our trousers are made from lovely materials including sweat and cotton and there are jeans for all occasions. Our trousers, chinos and jeans start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Outerwear-Fleece

An important part of your child’s wardrobe is outerwear. Find you favourite down jacket, fleece jacket, down gilet or snowsuit among the many colours and models. All of our outerwear is designed to keep your child warm and dry in all types of weather. Especially our technical outerwear is of high quality and secure and therefore both water tight, wind tight and breathable. Notice also the many details such as reflectors, removable hood, wind skirt, shoe straps and pockets. Our jackets, snow pants, fleece jackets and snow suits start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Underwear-Nightwear

At POMPdeLUX we make underwear and nightwear that is nice to wear. This is why we use soft materials that are of high quality and which your child will love wearing. Underwear and nightwear must not only be practical but also have a great design. In the collection you will find underpants, boxers, undershirts and pyjamas. Our underwear and nightwear start in size 80 cm and go up to 152 cm and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.

Accessories

To complete your child’s wardrobe the collection can be combined with our many cool accessories. POMPdeLUX has everything from suspenders and belts to mittens, hats and scarves. Our popular accessories match the rest of the collection and can therefore be combined with smart sweatshirts, lovely cardigans and cool trousers. Our belts, suspenders, mittens, hats and scarves can be used by boys of all ages and there is lots of inspiration to be discovered for children’s wardrobe.
